title: My Audio Cutter 1.2
text:

Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $19.00 Giveaway of the day — My Audio Cutter 1.2 My Audio Cutter is a tool that lets users cut audio files into pieces. User rating: 1 (50%) 1 (50%) Leave a comment 
My Audio Cutter 1.2 is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now My Audio Cutter 1.2 Terms and conditions 
My Audio Cutter is a tool that lets users cut audio files into pieces. The software's interface is friendly and intuitive. It allows you to define in visual or manual mode the start and end time or length to perform the cut. You can play preview the selected segment for better cutting accuracy. It can also add fade-in/fade-out effects to the output audio file. These effects will make the output audio file sound smooth. My Audio Cutter supports audio formats MP3, MP2, WAV, WMA, OGG, FLAC, AIFF, M4A, AAC, AC3, and WV. System Requirements: 
Windows XP/ 2000/ 2003/ 2008/ Vista/ 7/ 8/ 10; 1.2GHz Intel or AMD CPU; 1G MB RAM; 500 MB Hard Disk Storage Publisher:
